rooms.description: Large open space combining the entrance with a bohemian styled living area that flows into an indoor garden. The design respects Vastu by having the main door on the east and uses natural materials to enhance energy flow.
Bohemian dining space with rustic elements, natural lighting and open access to a semi-outdoor terrace. Aligned to Vastu for dining area placement.
Modern yet bohemian kitchen with exposed brickwork and vintage decor, optimized for workflow according to local building norms and Vastu principles.
Spacious guest bedroom with bohemian decor and ample storage. Located near the living area, ensuring energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated home office space designed for productivity and creativity, featuring natural lighting and soundproofing, compliant with local building norms.
